title: A godlie and fruitfull treatise of faith and workes. Wherein is confuted a certaine opinion of merit by workes, which an aduersary to the gospell of Christ Iesu, held in the conference, had in the Tower of London
author: H. D., fl. 1583.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by H. Bynneman] for Gregory Seton, and are to be sold at his shop vnder Aldersgate,
